items.badge_description: Grab your hoppiest India Pale Ale and get ready to celebrate IPA Day! One of the most iconic and popular styles in the beer world, let’s all raise a class in celebration!

items.checkin_comment: Copper color. Aroma is sweet toffee, fudge and caramel. Taste is caramel with a sweet-orange finish that brings a hint of bitternes.

beer.beer_description:
Grab a huge glass, or a salad bowl, or a fancy vase, fill it up with a few of these, and have a party with our fruity Summer Punch!

Contains barley malt, wheat malt, oat flakes and hops.

Achieve hop bliss.

When a single isn’t enough, make it a double. Doubling the hops and malts in a recipe results in a higher ABV and can pack quite a boozey punch. That's 10 different beers with the style that contains Imperial / Double in its style name. Try 5 more for Level 3!
So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.
